WebPart.SQL:
DECLARE @LoginID INT,@Status NVARCHAR(50),@EntityType NVARCHAR(50),@GroupID INT,@RoleID INT ; SELECT @LoginID=0,@Status='',@GroupID=0,@RoleID=0; SELECT @LoginID=LoginID,@EntityType=EntityType,@Status=[Status] FROM dbo.tblCtcPersons WHERE LoginID={{@@LoginID}}) IF EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM dbo.tblSecGroups WHERE SecGroupID in (SELECT SecGroupID FROM tblSecGroupPersons WHERE LoginID=@LoginID) AND SecGroupName='Security Admin') BEGIN SELECT YL.ID,TL.Description AS HousesType,TL1.Description AS JYLX,(YL.FCZJ+N' 万元') AS FCZJ,YL.FCDK, (SELECT dbo.fnYL_GetFCHX(YL.FCHU1,YL.FCHU2,YL.FCHU3)) AS FCHU1 ,(YL.FCMJ +N' 平方米') AS FCMJ,(YL.SZLC +N' 层') AS SZLC, (YL.GYLC +N' 层') AS GYLC,YL.JZNF,YL.MSF,TL2.Description AS ZXYQ,TL3.Description AS FWCX,TL4.Description AS XQXZ,YL.XQDZ, (SELECT dbo.fnYL_GetFCTS(YL.FCTS)) AS FCTS,YL.FXBT,YL.FXMS,CP.DisplayName AS ModifiedBy, (SELECT CONVERT(nvarchar(10), YL.ModifiedDate, 121)) AS ModifiedDate FROM tblYLHouses YL LEFT JOIN dbo.tblTicketLookup TL ON YL.HousesType=TL.LookupKey AND TL.LookupCat=N'房产类型' LEFT JOIN dbo.tblTicketLookup TL1 ON YL.JYLX=TL1.LookupKey AND TL1.LookupCat=N'发布类型' LEFT JOIN dbo.tblTicketLookup TL2 ON YL.ZXYQ=TL2.LookupKey AND TL2.LookupCat=N'装修要求' LEFT JOIN dbo.tblTicketLookup TL3 ON YL.FWCX=TL3.LookupKey AND TL3.LookupCat=N'房屋朝向' LEFT JOIN dbo.tblTicketLookup TL4 ON YL.XQXZ=TL4.LookupKey AND TL4.LookupCat=N'小区名称' LEFT JOIN dbo.tblCtcPersons CP ON CP.LoginID=YL.ModifiedBy WHERE (YL.HousesType={{FCLX}} OR LEN(ISNULL({{FCLX}},''))=0) AND (YL.JYLX={{FBLX}} OR LEN(ISNULL({{FBLX}},''))=0) AND (YL.ModifiedDate>= dateadd(ms,0,DATEADD(dd, DATEDIFF(dd,0,{{FBSJ}}), 0)) OR LEN(ISNULL({{FBSJ}},''))=0) AND (YL.ModifiedDate<= dateadd(ms,-3,DATEADD(dd, DATEDIFF(dd,-1,{{FBSJ}}), 0)) OR LEN(ISNULL({{FBSJ}},''))=0) AND (YL.FXMS={{FCZD}} OR LEN(ISNULL({{FCZD}},''))=0) ORDER BY YL.ModifiedDate DESC END ELSE IF @EntityType='O' AND @Status=N'已通过' BEGIN SELECT @GroupID=CGR.GroupID FROM dbo.tblCtcRoleTags CRT INNER JOIN dbo.tblCtcGroupRoles CGR ON CGR.TagName = CRT.TagName WHERE CRT.RoleID=@RoleID AND CRT.TagName LIKE '%Staff Admin%'
SELECT YL.ID,TL.Description AS HousesType,TL1.Description AS JYLX,(YL.FCZJ+N' 万元') AS FCZJ,YL.FCDK, (SELECT dbo.fnYL_GetFCHX(YL.FCHU1,YL.FCHU2,YL.FCHU3)) AS FCHU1 ,(YL.FCMJ +N' 平方米') AS FCMJ,(YL.SZLC +N' 层') AS SZLC, (YL.GYLC +N' 层') AS GYLC,YL.JZNF,YL.MSF,TL2.Description AS ZXYQ,TL3.Description AS FWCX,TL4.Description AS XQXZ,YL.XQDZ, (SELECT dbo.fnYL_GetFCTS(YL.FCTS)) AS FCTS,YL.FXBT,YL.FXMS,CP.DisplayName AS ModifiedBy, (SELECT CONVERT(nvarchar(10), YL.ModifiedDate, 121)) AS ModifiedDate FROM tblYLHouses YL LEFT JOIN dbo.tblTicketLookup TL ON YL.HousesType=TL.LookupKey AND TL.LookupCat=N'房产类型' LEFT JOIN dbo.tblTicketLookup TL1 ON YL.JYLX=TL1.LookupKey AND TL1.LookupCat=N'发布类型' LEFT JOIN dbo.tblTicketLookup TL2 ON YL.ZXYQ=TL2.LookupKey AND TL2.LookupCat=N'装修要求' LEFT JOIN dbo.tblTicketLookup TL3 ON YL.FWCX=TL3.LookupKey AND TL3.LookupCat=N'房屋朝向' LEFT JOIN dbo.tblTicketLookup TL4 ON YL.XQXZ=TL4.LookupKey AND TL4.LookupCat=N'小区名称' LEFT JOIN dbo.tblCtcPersons CP ON CP.LoginID=YL.ModifiedBy INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT CP1.LoginID FROM dbo.tblCtcGroupRoles CGR INNER JOIN tblCtcRoleTags CRT ON CGR.TagName = CRT.TagName INNER JOIN dbo.tblCtcPersons CP1 ON CP1.DefaultRoleID =CRT.RoleID WHERE GroupID=@GroupID AND RoleName IN('Staff IC','Staff','Staff Admin') ) AS Res ON Res.LoginID=YL.CreatedBy WHERE (YL.HousesType={{FCLX}} OR LEN(ISNULL({{FCLX}},''))=0) AND (YL.JYLX={{FBLX}} OR LEN(ISNULL({{FBLX}},''))=0) AND (YL.ModifiedDate>= dateadd(ms,0,DATEADD(dd, DATEDIFF(dd,0,{{FBSJ}}), 0)) OR LEN(ISNULL({{FBSJ}},''))=0) AND (YL.ModifiedDate<= dateadd(ms,-3,DATEADD(dd, DATEDIFF(dd,-1,{{FBSJ}}), 0)) OR LEN(ISNULL({{FBSJ}},''))=0) AND (YL.FXMS={{FCZD}} OR LEN(ISNULL({{FCZD}},''))=0) ORDER BY YL.ModifiedDate DESC END ELSE BEGIN SELECT YL.ID,TL.Description AS HousesType,TL1.Description AS JYLX,(YL.FCZJ+N' 万元') AS FCZJ,YL.FCDK, (SELECT dbo.fnYL_GetFCHX(YL.FCHU1,YL.FCHU2,YL.FCHU3)) AS FCHU1 ,(YL.FCMJ +N' 平方米') AS FCMJ,(YL.SZLC +N' 层') AS SZLC, (YL.GYLC +N' 层') AS GYLC,YL.JZNF,YL.MSF,TL2.Description AS ZXYQ,TL3.Description AS FWCX,TL4.Description AS XQXZ,YL.XQDZ, (SELECT dbo.fnYL_GetFCTS(YL.FCTS)) AS FCTS,YL.FXBT,YL.FXMS,CP.DisplayName AS ModifiedBy, (SELECT CONVERT(nvarchar(10), YL.ModifiedDate, 121)) AS ModifiedDate FROM tblYLHouses YL LEFT JOIN dbo.tblTicketLookup TL ON YL.HousesType=TL.LookupKey AND TL.LookupCat=N'房产类型' LEFT JOIN dbo.tblTicketLookup TL1 ON YL.JYLX=TL1.LookupKey AND TL1.LookupCat=N'发布类型' LEFT JOIN dbo.tblTicketLookup TL2 ON YL.ZXYQ=TL2.LookupKey AND TL2.LookupCat=N'装修要求' LEFT JOIN dbo.tblTicketLookup TL3 ON YL.FWCX=TL3.LookupKey AND TL3.LookupCat=N'房屋朝向' LEFT JOIN dbo.tblTicketLookup TL4 ON YL.XQXZ=TL4.LookupKey AND TL4.LookupCat=N'小区名称' LEFT JOIN dbo.tblCtcPersons CP ON CP.LoginID=YL.ModifiedBy WHERE (YL.HousesType={{FCLX}} OR LEN(ISNULL({{FCLX}},''))=0) AND (YL.JYLX={{FBLX}} OR LEN(ISNULL({{FBLX}},''))=0) AND (YL.ModifiedDate>= dateadd(ms,0,DATEADD(dd, DATEDIFF(dd,0,{{FBSJ}}), 0)) OR LEN(ISNULL({{FBSJ}},''))=0) AND (YL.ModifiedDate<= dateadd(ms,-3,DATEADD(dd, DATEDIFF(dd,-1,{{FBSJ}}), 0)) OR LEN(ISNULL({{FBSJ}},''))=0) AND (YL.FXMS={{FCZD}} OR LEN(ISNULL({{FCZD}},''))=0) AND YL.CreatedBy=@LoginID=@LoginID ORDER BY YL.ModifiedDate DESC END
